alert.note: Alert for Inland Miami-Dade County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 28 at 2:58PM EST until January 30 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 over the Redlands area and 31 over the Everglades area are possible. * WHERE...Inland Miami-Dade County. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 AM EST this morning. For the Freeze Watch, from late Saturday night through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
